title: File sync between local and remote VM
overview:
Agent needs access to local config and items, and must retrieve generated artifacts from remote VM.

**Motivation:** Enables agent to work with local files while running remotely and retrieve results.

**Success criteria:**
- Upload paths configurable
- Download paths configurable
- Files Base64-encoded for transfer
- Large files (>10MB) sync correctly
- Binary integrity preserved
- Unicode filenames handled
- Deep nested paths (10+ levels) work

**Technical constraints:**
- Base64 encoding for all file transfers
- Uses Fly.io API for file operations

**Signals:** priority: medium
